environment
Class WallRepulsion

java.lang.Object
  environment.Force
      environment.WallRepulsion
Direct Known Subclasses:
WallRepulsion1, WallRepulsion2, WallRepulsion3, WallRepulsion4
public abstract class WallRepulsion
extends Force

Subclass of Force that applies a force to mass that is inversely proportional to normal distance between wall and mass raised to exponent

Author:
Yuhua Mai, Susan Zhang
